completedCampaigns.title: Completed Campaigns
completedCampaigns.subtitle: Let's look back at the successes and positive impacts we've created together
completedCampaigns.question: Would you like to explore the touching stories behind each campaign?
completedCampaigns.description: Each campaign contains tireless efforts and love that spreads to the community.

campaigns.title: Light up the future
campaigns.description: Support over 7,000 street children and trafficking victims return to safe lives.
campaigns.details: The program focuses on emergency rescue, education and vocational training, helping children reintegrate into the community.

campaigns.title: Return smiles
campaigns.description: 2024 Campaign: 39 surgeries in just 5 days, while transferring equipment & training local nurses
campaigns.details: Each complete surgery package ~6 million VND, bringing the ability to eat - speak - breathe normally for children.

campaigns.title: One drop of blood, millions of hearts
campaigns.description: April 2025 blood donation drive attracted >200 people, providing 870 units of blood to shortage hospitals
campaigns.details: Ho Chi Minh City currently leads the country, accounting for nearly 20% of voluntary blood donations annually.

campaigns.title: Run for Hearts 2024
campaigns.description: 2024 event brought together >5,000 people and raised 6.08 billion VND for children with congenital heart disease
campaigns.details: From 2013 to present, the program has sponsored heart surgery for 1,549 children.

campaigns.title: Stand together after floods
campaigns.description: Historic floods killed >170 people; IFRC and partners provided food, clean water, cash to tens of thousands of households
campaigns.details: Each food relief package of 500,000 VND helps a family of 4 for 1 week.
